attributes.additional_details: Because he is doing more than anyone to get us thought this troubling time, and is doing so in style and grace, all the things one would expect from a British Gentleman.
attributes.background: Give Chris Whitty a Knighthood for his outstanding efforts in tackling COVID- 19

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
